@@ -81,1 +81,1 @@ - * Creates either a stream or a datagram socket. + * Creates a stream socket. @@ -84,7 +84,4 @@ - * The {@link Socket} constructors to create a datagram socket - * are deprecated for removal and throw an exception when creating - * a datagram socket. Those deprecated constructors no longer call - * this method. - *
